players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Oh no, Bob is dead! I was hoping to hear from him first. Let's all share our thoughts."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "I am the detective! Charlie is lying. I investigated him and he is mafioso. Vote Charlie!"
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves she is mafia. Alice, trust me - vote Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
